page.title: 02LANDSCAPE
page.content: Gellifor is a quiet village from which most people travel away to work.Many travel a great distance to their workplace,but communications are quite good.Unemployment affects this area as much as everywhere else.There has been a lot of movement of population over the years with older people coming to retire as well as families with young children.Many of the young people have to leave the area to find work.People come here from all parts of the U.K.The majority of the older population speak Welsh,but there is a gradual change and at present only five children from fortyfive at the school speak Welsh as a first language.
